verses.text: \w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*, departing \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w Athens|strong="G0116"\w*, \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Corinth|strong="G2882"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w finding|strong="G2147"\w* \w a|strong="G2147"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*, \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Aquila|strong="G0207"\w*, born \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pontus|strong="G4193"\w*, lately \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Italy|strong="G2482"\w*, \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w Priscilla|strong="G4252"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, (\w because|strong="G1223"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* \w Claudius|strong="G2804"\w* \w had|strong="G2064"\w* \w commanded|strong="G1299"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w to|strong="G2064"\w* depart \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Rome|strong="G4516"\w*,) \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G2064"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w because|strong="G1223"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w trade|strong="G3673"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w remained|strong="G3306"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* wrought; (\w now|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w tentmakers|strong="G4635"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w trade|strong="G3673"\w*.)

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w reasoned|strong="G1256"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w sabbath|strong="G4521"\w*, bringing \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* name \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* Lord \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w persuaded|strong="G3982"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Greeks|strong="G1672"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* \w Silas|strong="G4609"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Timothy|strong="G5095"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w come|strong="G1510"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* earnest \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w preaching|strong="G3056"\w*, \w testifying|strong="G1263"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w that|strong="G5613"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* gainsaying \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blaspheming|strong="G0987"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w shook|strong="G1621"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w garments|strong="G2440"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Your|strong="G2532"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w*; \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1473"\w* \w clean|strong="G2513"\w*: \w from|strong="G0575"\w* henceforth \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G1484"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w departing|strong="G3327"\w* thence, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w*, \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Titus|strong="G5103"\w* \w Justus|strong="G2459"\w*, \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* worshipped \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* adjoining \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Crispus|strong="G2921"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* ruler \w of|strong="G3624"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w synagogue|strong="G0752"\w*, \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w of|strong="G3624"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Corinthians|strong="G2881"\w* \w hearing|strong="G0191"\w*, \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w nights|strong="G3571"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G3004"\w* \w vision|strong="G3705"\w*: \w Do|strong="G5399"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w fear|strong="G5399"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hold \w not|strong="G3361"\w* thy peace,

\w Because|strong="G1360"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* thee: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* set \w upon|strong="G1510"\w* thee, \w to|strong="G2532"\w* hurt thee; \w for|strong="G1722"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* stayed \w there|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w year|strong="G1763"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w six|strong="G1803"\w* \w months|strong="G3376"\w*, \w teaching|strong="G1321"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w Gallio|strong="G1058"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w proconsul|strong="G0446"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w Achaia|strong="G0882"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w with|strong="G1909"\w* \w one|strong="G3661"\w* \w accord|strong="G3661"\w* rose up \w against|strong="G1909"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w judgment|strong="G0968"\w* \w seat|strong="G0968"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*: \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* persuadeth \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w worship|strong="G4576"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w contrary|strong="G3844"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* beginning \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w open|strong="G0455"\w* \w his|strong="G0455"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*, \w Gallio|strong="G1058"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*: \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w it|strong="G1161"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w matter|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* injustice, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w an|strong="G1510"\w* heinous deed, \w O|strong="G5599"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w I|strong="G1487"\w* \w should|strong="G5100"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w reason|strong="G3056"\w* \w bear|strong="G0430"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w questions|strong="G2213"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w names|strong="G3686"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w your|strong="G3708"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w look|strong="G3708"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w judge|strong="G2923"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w such|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w drove|strong="G0556"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w judgment|strong="G0968"\w* \w seat|strong="G0968"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* laying \w hold|strong="G1949"\w* \w on|strong="G1161"\w* \w Sosthenes|strong="G4988"\w*, \w the|strong="G3956"\w* ruler \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w synagogue|strong="G0752"\w*, \w beat|strong="G5180"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w judgment|strong="G0968"\w* \w seat|strong="G0968"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Gallio|strong="G1058"\w* cared \w for|strong="G3956"\w* \w none|strong="G3762"\w* \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* stayed \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G2425"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w taking|strong="G0657"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w leave|strong="G0657"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w sailed|strong="G1602"\w* thence \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Syria|strong="G4947"\w* (\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w Priscilla|strong="G4252"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Aquila|strong="G0207"\w*), \w having|strong="G2192"\w* shorn \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* Cenchrae: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w vow|strong="G2171"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w came|strong="G1525"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w left|strong="G2641"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w there|strong="G0847"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* \w entering|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w*, disputed \w with|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* desired \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w would|strong="G0846"\w* tarry \w a|strong="G1909"\w* \w longer|strong="G1909"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w*, \w he|strong="G0846"\w* consented \w not|strong="G3756"\w*;

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w taking|strong="G0657"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w leave|strong="G0657"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*: \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w return|strong="G0344"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w willing|strong="G2309"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* departed \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w going|strong="G0305"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Caesarea|strong="G2542"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G0305"\w* \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* Jerusalem, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* saluted \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G3588"\w* \w spent|strong="G4160"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w* \w there|strong="G3101"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w departed|strong="G1831"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w through|strong="G1330"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w country|strong="G5561"\w* \w of|strong="G5100"\w* \w Galatia|strong="G1054"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Phrygia|strong="G5435"\w*, \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w order|strong="G2517"\w*, confirming \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*, \w named|strong="G3686"\w* Apollo, born \w at|strong="G1722"\w* Alexandria, \w an|strong="G1510"\w* \w eloquent|strong="G3052"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w*, \w came|strong="G2658"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*, \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w mighty|strong="G1415"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w scriptures|strong="G1124"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w instructed|strong="G1321"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w being|strong="G1510"\w* \w fervent|strong="G2204"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w spoke|strong="G2980"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* diligently \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1987"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w baptism|strong="G0908"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w therefore|strong="G1161"\w* \w began|strong="G0757"\w* \w to|strong="G0757"\w* \w speak|strong="G3955"\w* \w boldly|strong="G3955"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w*. \w Whom|strong="G3588"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w Priscilla|strong="G4252"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Aquila|strong="G0207"\w* \w had|strong="G2316"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*, \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w took|strong="G4355"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G0757"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* expounded \w to|strong="G0757"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2316"\w* more diligently.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w whereas|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G3739"\w* desirous \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w go|strong="G1330"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Achaia|strong="G0882"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* exhorting, \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* receive \w him|strong="G0846"\w*. \w Who|strong="G3739"\w*, \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G3739"\w* \w come|strong="G3854"\w*, \w helped|strong="G4820"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w had|strong="G3739"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w with|strong="G1223"\w* much vigour \w he|strong="G1510"\w* convinced \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* openly, shewing \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w scriptures|strong="G1124"\w*, \w that|strong="G2453"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.
